==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
Graphical manipulations on {{zh-l|兵|soldier}}, converting it into a similar-sounding onomatopoeia. First attested in {{w|Ming Dynasty}} and referred to the sound of collisions (during a fight). Later used as a {{translit|zh|en|ping pong|nocap=y}}.
